page.title: 01Brisley and Horningtoft
page.content:
This is a country area, where most of the land is arable farmland. The block includes two small villages, Brisley and Horningtoft, the eastern edge of a third village, Whissonsett and the northern edge of Stanfield.
The houses of Horningtoft are well scattered, with a small group near the church. In Brisley the houses straggle along the roads leading from the church.
On the eastern side of Brisley is a large common, called Brisley Green, which is crossed by the road to North Elmham. The green is grazed by cattle,sheep and horses. There are a number of houses on the fringe of the Green.
